Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Show me your arm. I'll give it a look.", 4: '1'}
{3: "After a quick examination, Vera's brows suddenly furrow."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'How long has it been since you changed this dressing? Over three days, I bet.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't really remember...", 3: '10', 4: "It's not that serious anyway.", 5: '10'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'And your team usually goes on independent missions for three days. You really are something else.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'The outer compartment of that first aid kit—yes, that one—unzip it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you redressing my wound?', 3: '13'}
{3: "Looking down and opening Vera's custom medical kit, you are shocked to discover just how unusual it is."}
{3: 'It is packed to the brim with serum and several shots of adrenaline, but there is not a single painkiller or hemostatic gel.'}
{2: 'What kind of first aid kit is this?', 3: '16', 4: "This isn't a medical kit—it's the Berserker Buff.", 5: '16'}
{3: 'Vera quickly finishes the rest of the apples with a few bites, washes her hands, and takes out a roll of gauze from the kit—probably the only truly "life-saving" item in there.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Perfect for a reckless idiot like you, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Stay still, or I can't promise I'll be gentle with my hands.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing that, you sit obediently and watch as Vera disinfects your wound and carefully wraps it with gauze.'}
{3: 'You expected Vera to be the type who would rush through the process without being considerate, but her motions are surprisingly gentle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Anything else besides this? Does your side abdomen still hurt?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Side abdomen?', 3: '25', 4: 'The wound from the Pulia Forest Park Ruins?', 5: '25'}
{3: "Memories of that day flood back at the mention of it. You remember the Hetero-Hive Mother's tentacle piercing deep into your side abdomen."}
{3: 'A sharp pain shoots through your old wound, forcing an involuntary frown.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Did the Hetero-Hive Mother hit there too...? How unfortunate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I heard you had a pretty rough time on the surface back then.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Actually, I was unconscious most of the time, so I don't really remember much of the pain.", 3: '30'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You say that, but your expression betrayed you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I should jab your wound and remind you what pain feels like. Otherwise, you'll just be this stubborn again next time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Relax, won't you? Stop staring at me like that. I'm not going to poke you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera tosses out a few more teasing remarks, then adds a small decorative bow to the bandaged wound.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "All done. Next time, you can just remove it. It's healing fairly well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'll leave the first aid kit and fruit basket here. Next time you get yourself hurt, I'll just send my regards remotely through them.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vera', 3: "Since your lounge is empty, I'll take a break here. The Cerberus lounge is a complete disaster thanks to those two idiots... Ugh, never mind. Just thinking about it gives me a headache.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'This is a notification, not a negotiation.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera stretches and tosses her hair over the chair back, sinking comfortably into the seat.'}
